title: Oroville (California)
name: Table Mountain
directions: Take Cherokee Rd. Drive 6.3 miles to the unmarked parking area on the left at a green cattle gate
content: While this area can be visited year round, it is best seen in the Spring when the large, flat field on the plateau of this mountain are full of endless wildflowers.  Additionally, there are excellent waterfalls to hike to and be seen such as Ravine and Phantom Falls.  Those interested in preparing can read up on these hikes [http://www.waterfallswest.com/waterfall.php?id=205] as well as read the book, "Wildflowers of Table Mountain" by Mackey & Bills.
